name: Proto Tower 24
description: I don't have anymore secrets to reveal at this time... but I will say that this particular background pattern value 'Corners' is one of my favorites to draw. I'm excited to record a few of these drawings in the future, especially at higher resolutions, because that would be a lot of fun to watch in high speed.

attributes.value: for i in {22..30}; do cp 21.json "$i.json"; done
